subject: Status and perquisites of CVO as Functional Director of Board Level.
text: HRafu <cfk 7THTi ufaarv {HN / phone: 91-11-25074100125074200 (a3t @aet #r 7mut #Aau) #A / Fax 91-11-25093507 25093514 T % AT T National Highways Authority of India VR. /Extn:: 2223 2318 2468 2553 (Ministry of Road Transport and Highways) j-5 &a 6, #7er-10, ETrAT; 7 Rarit- 110 075 G-5 & 6, Sector-1O, Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 NHAI-12011/7/95-Admn Dated 16.08.2010 OFFCE ORDER In compliance to the instructions from the Central Vigilance Commission vide no. 003/ VGL/18 dated the 17th September 2003, it has been decided that the Chief Vigilance Officer in NHAL would henceforth be accorded the status and perquisites of Functional Director of Board Level, 2 This issues with the approval of the Chairman: Ies (MEETA STNGH) GM (HRVADMN)-II CVO to: 1 FS to Chairman 2 PS to All Members 3 All NHAI Officers & Staff Pius NHAL To, Copy
